purpose: Template for generating a systematic search pattern for a target receptacle.

target_receptacle.description: The name of the receptacle to find (e.g., 'garbagecan 1').

initial_observation.description: The initial environment description containing a list of receptacles.

search_strategy.description: 'exhaustive' checks all known receptacles; 'smart' uses heuristics to prioritize likely locations.

actions.description: A list of 'go to' actions to execute in order.

found_at.description: The receptacle where the target was found (if known).

example.initial_observation: You are in the middle of a room. Looking quickly around you, you see a cabinet 1, a cabinet 2, a countertop 1, a garbagecan 1.
